description: This table is used to store information from the overtime-related Orders items used for the result read/acknowledgment tracking feature. Namely, this is the Read or Acknowledge by User (I ORD 1910) and Read or Acknowledged On (I ORD 1915) items.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for when and who viewed the results associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: READ_ACK_ACTUAL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores when the result was actually viewed by an end user.

columns.name: WHO_READ_ACK_EMP_ID
columns.description: This item stores which user viewed this result.
